scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:api && npm run clean:gui
scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:api && npm run install:gui
scripts.build:all: npm run link:shared && npm run build:shared && npm run build:api && npm run build:gui
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.link:shared: cd api && npm install ../shared && cd ../gui && npm install ../shared
